name: The Squaretaker
description:
Please unzip the file to play it; Our first video game, first game jam and first using the Godot engine; That's a lot of first!

-> Move with arrow pad.

-> Shoot with left click; Use bouncy shield with right click.

Game by Gariwald & Me ; OST by Osun6

We didn't have time to put the scenario in but I guarantee you it would have been grandiose.

Game Hint: There are multiple ways to win some level; Sacrificing yourself for the sake of him is one of them. After all, you're his caretaker aren't you?
